amendment.description: Amendment strikes the language in the bill which requires FEMA to include on its flood maps areas of residual risk.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 112-138 to eliminate requirements to more broadly map areas considered to be residual risk.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 163 (Roll no. 556).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cardoza amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 261 - 163 (Roll no. 556).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Cardoza.
